The notch is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and dimensions 2 units by 4 units by 0.2812 units. Coordinate System Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.2812, 0.0, 0.0469] Sketch 1. Face 1 a. Loop 1 i. Line 4: Draw a line from [0.0, 0.2812] to [0.0, 0.0] Extrusion 1. Extrude face 1 by 0.2812 units along the negative normal direction. 2. Apply a scale of 0.2812 to the sketch. 3. Perform a CutFeatureOperation for the extrusion. Height (overall): 4 Width (overall): 3 Length (overall): 2 Height (part 1): 4 Width (part 1): 3 Length (part 1): 2 Height (part 2): 0.2812 Width (part 2): 0.75 Length (part 2): 2 The final assembly consists of two parts: 1. A base rectangular prism without the notch (part 1). 2. A notch cut out of the base rectangular prism (part 2). Please generate the CAD model according to these instructions and the JSON provided. Double-check the dimensions and coordinate systems to ensure accuracy.</description>
